White resigns, 
If 24.hxg3 then 24...Ne2# 
If 24.fxg3 then 24...Ne2 25.Kh1 Rf1# 
And If 24.Qxg3 then 24...Ne2  25.Kh1 25.Nxg3  26.Kg1 (if 26. fxg3 then 26... Rf1#) 26.Nxf1 27.gxh1 and black is up a full piece going into the endgame.
